outbound.choose:
<when condition="@(context.Response.StatusCode < 400)">
				
                                                    {
  "findCatalogItemResponse" : 
  {
    "findCatalogItemResult" : 
    {
      "catalogBrand" : 
      {
        "brand" : "{{body.envelope.body.FindCatalogItemResponse.FindCatalogItemResult.CatalogBrand.Brand}}",
        "id" : {{body.envelope.body.FindCatalogItemResponse.FindCatalogItemResult.CatalogBrand.Id}}
      },
      "catalogBrandId" : {{body.envelope.body.FindCatalogItemResponse.FindCatalogItemResult.CatalogBrandId}},
      "catalogType" : 
      {
        "id" : {{body.envelope.body.FindCatalogItemResponse.FindCatalogItemResult.CatalogType.Id}},
        "type" : "{{body.envelope.body.FindCatalogItemResponse.FindCatalogItemResult.CatalogType.Type}}"
      },
      "catalogTypeId" : {{body.envelope.body.FindCatalogItemResponse.FindCatalogItemResult.CatalogTypeId}},
      "description" : "{{body.envelope.body.FindCatalogItemResponse.FindCatalogItemResult.Description}}",
      "id" : {{body.envelope.body.FindCatalogItemResponse.FindCatalogItemResult.Id}},
      "name" : "{{body.envelope.body.FindCatalogItemResponse.FindCatalogItemResult.Name}}",
      "picturefilename" : "{{body.envelope.body.FindCatalogItemResponse.FindCatalogItemResult.Picturefilename}}",
      "price" : {{body.envelope.body.FindCatalogItemResponse.FindCatalogItemResult.Price}}
    }
  }
}

                                        
			
			
				<set-variable name="old-body" value="@(context.Response.Body.As(preserveContent: true))" />
				
				
                {
                "error": {
                    "code": "{{body.envelope.body.fault.faultcode}}",
                      "message": "{{body.envelope.body.fault.faultstring}}"
                      }
            }
                
				
					<when condition="@(string.IsNullOrEmpty(context.Response.Body.As(preserveContent: true)["error"]["code"].ToString()) && string.IsNullOrEmpty(context.Response.Body.As(preserveContent: true)["error"]["message"].ToString()))">
						@{
                            var newResponseBody = new JObject();
                            newResponseBody["error"] = new JObject();
                            newResponseBody["error"]["code"] = "InvalidErrorResponseBody";
                            if (string.IsNullOrEmpty((string)context.Variables["old-body"]))
                            {
                                newResponseBody["error"]["message"] = "The error response body was not a valid SOAP error response. The response body was empty.";
                            }
                            else
                            {
                                newResponseBody["error"]["message"] = "The error response body was not a valid SOAP error response. The response body was: '" + context.Variables["old-body"] + "'.";
                            }
                            return newResponseBody.ToString();
                        }
